title: Moto Racer 15th Anniversary
description:
The definitive motorbike game series is back!

Moto Racer is back with a new version, including all-new gyroscopic gameplay and even fiercer opponents than before! Hit speeds of over 300km/h as you race flat out against the toughest of rivals! Go head-to-head with your rivals in all-terrain races and tease them with your fanciest tricks. Pull off amazing Superman Seat Grabs, Indy Backflips and Can Cans as you fly through the air.

2 types of controls (Accelerometer, Touch controls)
4 Cameras (Near, Far, Gyroscopic camera, Cockpit)
3 levels of difficulty (Beginner, Expert, Confirmed)
3 game modes: Championship, Single Race, Records
Assisted braking available
Graphic settings

title: Cricket World Trophy 2016
description:
Welcome to this incredible game created for all cricket fans!
Now you too can experience this excellent sport on your phone or tablet! Begin your adventure in the quick match mode, where you’ll gain first experience in all the possible roles in a cricket team. You can test yourself and improve your abilities in the quick match mode by playing a full match. The Trophy mode gives you many hours of fun. Face all 16 national teams and fight for the gold championship copy.

- Three playing modes: Quick, Single Match, World Cup
- 16 teams to choose from
- Realistic graphics and physics

title: Illegal Motorbikes Racing
description:
Motorbikes, speed and racing is the perfect combination. And if the race is illegal, then things get really interesting. Feel the rush of adrenaline, race against your rivals and squeeze all there is out of your motorbike. The best machines await you in the garage and the mechanics will make sure that your motorbike will never let you down.

- Race against your rivals
- Ride the best machines in the garage
- Feel the rush of adrenaline

title: Ultimate Winter Sports 2016
description:
Do you like playing in the snow? Are winter sports and the adrenaline your thing? Then what are you waiting for, come and play “Ultimate Winter Sports 2016”. Everyone will find something for themselves here. Snowboarding, Slalom, Giant Slalom, Downhill and Ski Jumping - you have never seen so much fun in one fame!

- Famous winter sports styles
- Adrenaline competition

title: World Bowling Tour 2016
description:
Your own private bowling alley. Go bowling without leaving your home. Now, thanks to World Bowling Tour 2016, you can take your favourite entertainment everywhere with you. Play countless rounds in Quick Game, Euro Tour and Multiplayer modes. Set the ball right and knock down all the pins. Best of luck!

- Three game modes: Quick Game, Euro Tour and Multiplayer
- Realistic graphics
- Realistic game physics
- 5 lanes in different settings

title: RallyCross Ultimate
description:
Enhance your experience on each track with these powerful rally vehicles! You will be a master of acceleration, braking and steering. The drift is your best friend. The tracks are more and more technical and require an optimal concentration! Incredible speed and steering sensations await you! Are you ready to challenge the best drivers of the rally world?

- 20 new racing tracks
- 8 different RallyCross cars
- Incredible arcade physics
- Full 3D real-time rendering

title: Trial Xtreme 3
description:
Hear your motor roar while playing the new, most extreme 3D sports game ever!

Trial Xtreme 2 will take your breath away with its new innovations and new amazing features. Tackle completely original courses and fight against other bikers in the race! Win while carefully controlling your bike to ensure that you don’t break your bones and teeth on one of the mines, water pipes, or wrecked cars that are standing in your way. Customise your bike and rider to your own taste, then hit the course and win the race. Race against other bikers head to head, shoulder to shoulder and eye to eye to prove to everyone what we already know - That you are #1! The best, top Trial Xtremist out there!

137 completely new and original courses
7 worlds and hundreds of obstacles to jump and crash on
Advanced physics engine for a revolutionising gameplay

title: Xtreme Freestyle
description:
Get on your motorbike and taste the adrenaline! You don't need to go further, you are in the right place. This freestyle adventure is made for you. Don't be afraid, attach your helmet and take the handlebar of your XTrem Motorbike. Many impressive acrobatics await you: BackFlip, Hart Attack, Shaolin, Cliffhanger, Rock Solid, Tsunami, Cordova... and more! Thrills are guaranteed!

Options for accelerometer sensitivity and virtual-pad
Impressive acrobatics
Full 3D real-time rendering

title: CR7 Penalty
description:
Secure World Cup glory for your home country by winning the penalty shootout!
He shoots. He scores! The crowd goes wild! Can you secure World Cup glory for your home country? It all comes down to the penalty shootout. Develop your skills in Tutorial mode then hone them in Practice mode. When you are ready play successive rounds of penalty shootouts to win the final match. Penalty Ronaldo is fun and addictive!

- Develop your skills in Tutorial mode
- Hone them in Practice mode
- When you are ready to play successive rounds of penalty shootouts to win the final match

title: Super Pocket Football 2017
description:
Do you dream about winning the championship? Beat your opponents from around the world and win the cup with your team! Adjust your play style by changing your formations. Race around the pitch, take the ball away from your opponent and shoot the winning goal! Learn to pass and shoot in the training mode. Find the best tactical moves in friendly matches and win the football championship! Who will be a new champion?

- Many teams to choose from
- Formation selection
- Retro-styled graphics

title: Ronaldo: Kick 'N' Run
description:
CR7 Cristiano Ronaldo! Fast and furious football fun!

How would you like to be in the shoes of Cristiano Ronaldo – one of the world’s top football players? See how it feels to Kick and Run like CR7 in this unique game of skill and precision!  Strive to get the highest scores and you might even find yourself competing against none other than the real Cristiano Ronaldo! Many great gameplay features including 1vs1 matches, Tournaments, Run and Score while avoiding attacking players! Game on! 

- Amazing graphics and gameplay
- 1vs1 matches, Tournaments, Run and Score while avoiding attacking players
- Customize your character with special gear
- Collect special power-ups as you go

title: Formula Extreme 2016
description:
Fire up your racing skills on amazing tracks all over the world!
Make your way behind the wheel of your dream cars. “Formula Extreme 2016” will test your racing skills in the fastest rallies in the world. Your task is to win the race, unlock new routes, and become the driving master. Give it a try and win with the best of the best.

- Numerous game modes
- Time trials
- Standard races
- Varied challenges for players

title: Motorbikes Pro
description:
Select your bike and the arena, and test your racing skills! 
Face the challenge and gain the first place in the fantastic racing game loaded with adrenaline: "Motorbikes Pro". Your task is to beat all rivals and reach the finish line as fast as possible. You have the entire garage filled with the fastest bikes of the world to choose from. Jump on, step on the gas, and win!

- Dynamic bike driving experience
- 2 racing modes: Quick Race and Career
- 6 types of breathtaking bikes
- 3 realistic landscapes

title: Speed Racing Ultimate 3
description:
Are you ready to feel an adrenaline rush from excitement in this incredible game of furious racing? Face your fierce opponents in world championships and enjoy the incredible speed and steering sensations. Learn to master your car on unusual tracks with impressive acrobatics. These prestigious SuperCars will make you exceed your limits!

- Powerful and beautiful cars
- 60 racing challenges
- 20 different tracks
- 6 game modes: Career, Discover, Duel, Time Attack, Fight and Gymkhana

title: Ultimate Quad Bikes
description:
If you like cross-country driving in 4-wheel rides, this game is just the thing for you. Competition, mud, sand, and speed - this is everything that quad lovers adore. You will find this and more in this game. You will travel along the routes in the most beautiful locations all over the world. Beat your rivals. Be the first one at the finish line.

- Powerful quad rallies
- 11 routes in the most beautiful locations all over the world
- 3 types of quad bikes

title: Baseball Trophy 2016
description:
We invite you to play incredible game created for all baseball fans!
Welcome, everyone! We invite you to play incredible game created for all baseball fans! Now, you too can experience this excellent sport on your phone or tablet! Begin your adventure in the single match mode, where you’ll gain first experience in all the possible roles in a baseball team. You can test yourself and improve your abilities in the quick match mode or playing a single match. You can choose three kind of levels skills: easy, medium and hard one. World Cup  mode gives you many hours of fun. Face all of 8 national teams and fight for the gold championship.

- 3 game modes
- National teams to choose
- Great graphics and sounds 
- 3 difficulty modes

title: Euro Foosball 2016
description:
The tournament begins soon!
Care to play a game? Take a seat at the table and see if you can lead your team to victory. Select your team and your tactics. Be warned! "Euro Foosball 2016" is trully addictive!

- A dynamic gameplay
- Variety of table types and players
- 4 levels of difficulty: Easy, Medium, Hard, Insane
- Multiple match durations
